about_the_game:
Ravenbound is a fast-paced action game that combines the challenge of a roguelite with the choices of the open world. Master your combat skills, build your deck and beat the Betrayer in the mystic world of Ávalt.

Grow stronger with every death

You are a vessel in the service of the Raven who you help to restore its power in an effort to free the imprisoned gods of Ávalt. While each vessel is lost forever once they fall in battle, the strength they bring to the Raven is not. This allows you to come back stronger each time as you progress through this action roguelite.

Explore a fantasy world inspired by Scandinavian Folklore

Journey through the breathtaking island of Ávalt on foot or soar through the skies in Raven form. As you traverse this mysterious, Scandinavian-folklore inspired world, you will confront legendary creatures such as the towering Trolls, ruthless Hulders, and menacing undead Draugr.

Build your deck to beat the Betrayer

Progression comes in the form of cards and unlocks that you can find on your journey through Ávalt. In each lifetime new cards are unlocked, some by chance and some by player choice. As you grow stronger, so do the rewards. But be careful, each reward also increases the Betrayer's hatred which empowers her minions as it grows.

Learn to master the varied and fast paced combat

Learn to master the fast paced and fluid combat of Ravenbound to bring down the increasingly challenging and hostile creatures of Ávalt. By unlocking more cards you will expand your options as new armor, weapons and magical relics become available to you, granting you new ways to defeat the Raven's enemies with every lifetime.

content_descriptors.notes: Ravenbound depicts high levels of violence between humanoids with large amounts of blood and some environmental gore such as dead bodies and bloodied props.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 (4C / 4T) (Q3 ‘15), AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB, AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770, AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8 GB, AMD Vega 56 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Fear everything and nothing for death brings you closer to victory in this challenging open world action-roguelite. As the Vessel of an ancient power you must use steel and skill to complete your mission in a dangerous fantasy world inspired by Scandinavian folklore.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
